# isAcquired

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the racing wheel sends events to the app.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAcquired: Bool { get }
```

## Getting events

- **acquireDevice()**: Starts receiving events from the racing wheel.
- **relinquishDevice()**: Stops receiving events from the racing wheel.

items.description: Starts receiving events from the racing wheel.

items.description: Stops receiving events from the racing wheel.
